ResearchProjectDef.label: mobile mineral sonar
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Your miners are getting bored of drilling galleries which never lead to the precious ore pockets. One of them was a deep-space miner in his youth and used to enjoy using MiningCo. sonar devices and spoke about it with a researcher. You should give them some time to study the MiSoTech* core concept.
- Study the famous MiningCo. MiSoTech* to develop a mineral sonar able to scan and detect ore pockets in the heart of mountains.
* MiSoTech: Mineral Sonar Technology
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered:
By reverse-engineering the MiSoTech, you have developped an advanced sonar module able to detect all sort of ores through thick rock!
- You can now build mobile mineral sonar. With this technology jewel, you will never have to dig galleries blindly!

ResearchProjectDef.label: mobile mineral sonar: enhanced scan
ResearchProjectDef.description:
By doing some code refactoring in the MiSoTech* noise reduction algorithms, your researchers could improve the mobile mineral sonar efficiency.
- Improve the MiSoTech* to enhance the mobile mineral sonar efficiency.
* MiSoTech: Mineral Sonar Technology
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered:
MiSoTech* algorithms have been refactored and optimized. The spare CPU time has been reallocated to enhance the scan range and detection algorithms.
- Mobile mineral sonar scan range is increased (30 -> 50). - Mobile mineral sonar detection chance is increased.
* MiSoTech: Mineral Sonar Technology
